title: Komunikator

fields.name: Detect Comms:
fields.value: Target a player during the Evening. At the start of the following Night, you will learn all the players they were in a Hello Neighbor with. This can be used twice per Evening if you are Evil-aligned.

fields.name: Recorded Comms (x1, Charge 110%):
fields.value: During the Night, choose a Hello Neighbor that you are mechanically aware of the existence of, and where both players in it placed below you in the last Evening phase. You will receive the full logs from that channel.

fields.name: I See It All (Passive):
fields.value: If you are town aligned, place in the top 3, and target a player in a factional chat with Detect Comms, you will see a random player who is also in that chat amongst the real Hello Neighbors.
